tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Spinal Surgery,Spinal Disorders,Spine Injury,Slip Disc,Neck Pain Treatment,
review:
Hi.. I have visited the doctor twice once for me and other for my sister. We both have same problem which is disc bulge. For me after thoroughly checking MRI film and reports doctor have suggested the bulge is mild and surgery not required. This can be treated with medicine and physio therapy.
For my sister the disc bulge at L5-S1 is severe and has significant disc bulge in L3-L4 and L4-L5 levels. Before consulting doctor S. S. Kumar we have consulted spine surgeon in CMC vellore and MIOT Chennai. Both the doctors recommended for fusion implantation surgery and that is the best option.
After I gave a consultation with S. S. Kumar sir he examined both patient and reports then he suggested for endoscopy or microscopy surgery can be done to cure this issue and no need to go for open surgery. He explained clearly why we should not go for open surgery clearly as below.
1. Patient is only 29years old
2.As she has multiple bulge along with severe bulge we should not do major surgery which will impact other two discuss.
3.Spine stability is 100% so endoscopy or microscopy is the best option.

The felt like I have saved my sister's life from hospitalized for rest of her years.

***** ******* ********* **** *** *** **** *** ******  ******* *** ******** ******* ** ******** ******* 

I strongly recommend ASTRO ortho and spine Centre, Velachery especially S. S. Kumar sir.


Regards, 
Mahesh

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: yes, friendly, and explains the issue very well. clearly explaining the  treatment procedure, effect and result. explaining the medication very well.

I have had back pain on and off for 3 months but got worse last month .Initially I consulted Dr S. S. Kumar who suggested MRI scan which revealed a large herniated disc pinching my right leg nerve root. He diagnosed it as sciatica and asked me to take rest and put me on pain killers. Althogh I initially responded, However as the pain got worse, he gave me the surgical option called microdiscectomy. His explaination was crystal clear and he sounded very confident and positive and left the option to me to make a decision . As the pain was intolerable and I ran out of all non surgical options, I underwent surgery last week. I could walk immediately after surgery *** ** *** ****** Astra hospital didnt feel like a hospital to me, all the staff were extremely friendly, empathetic and compassionate. 

I would highly recommend Dr S S Kumar and his team *** ***** ***** ****** * **** *** *** **** ****** ******* ******** *** highly ethical in their approach 

10 stars if there is an option!!

I have visited This center for the treatment of joint broken in finger. After **** diagnosis Dr.Kumar advised me to undergone for surgery which went smooth and now i m completely alright now, (i was advised by few of my friends to ho with puttur mavu kattu.but they didnt give me assirance for the complete recover .so i decided to go with surgery)  I am completely satisfied with the treatment and the way they treated each patient. Especially Dr. Kumar showed extreme  care towards patiens recovery. Money is not their focus at any time, Pre and post surgery treatments were good. No delay in my all appointments, They didnt asked me to take unnecessary tests. I will definitely recommend Dr.Kumar for any artho problems treatments.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I had spine surgery done in another hospital outside tamilnadu, where they did a mistake to me in operation.  Due to that mistake, after 5 months of surgery I got CSF leakage in my suture line. Then I visited Dr. S.S KUMAR in Astra Spine Center in Velachery and Semmencheri nookaplyam link road, searched through YouTube, Doctor examined and given proper explanation and his treatment was good to me. I got admitted in hospital for 7 days, all the staffs were good in communicating things and immediate responses were given to me. Good nursing care. Good management systems. Duty doctors also have utmost care towards me and great concern. The Food provided by Hospital is soo good and its like homely food , Well maintained hospital ,It's best Spine and Ortho hospital in chennai with best reasonable cost. I do recommend this hospital for my family and friends.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Doctor appears to diagnose the core issue quickly. In my case I had pins and needles / tingling in hands and doctor suspected this to be ulnar nerve entrapment. However while surgery is the only option to release, DR Kumar did not opt for this as other tests showed inconclusive result. While I am still awaiting the relief I respect the doctors decision in not wanting to do surgery unless there is a conclusive evidence.  This is the approach a doctor must have.  Would recommend this doctor to anyone.

The doctor was not available both the time we visited the hospital. The hospital is far from my home yet we were made to wait for more than 4 hours, the second time when we visited the doctor was not even in the hospital nor was he going to visit the hospital. No one from the hospital nor the doctor informed us about this. Very bad experience - we spent around 1000 rs just for travel But then we still couldn’t see the doctor. Highly disappointed and will never visit this hospital or the doctor ever again. My sincere advice to others is please don’t visit this hospital,

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: The quality of service rendered at this facility is exquisite. Welcoming front office staff and special note of thanks to the physiotherapist at this facility who helped me greatly to get over the pain with quality care. And about doctor S.S Kumar, he is a fantastic professional who listens to the patients problems and provides effective remedies. He helped me get over nagging disc problems and has always been my go to doctor for any spinal ailments. I would defenitely recommend this hospital to my friends & family.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
* ****** *** **** ****** ** ******** ** ***** *****.
When i searched about the best doctors i read everyone's review. Then we found Dr S S Kumar.

When i booked the appointment right the follow-up to appointment till I met the doctor, hospital staffs were guiding us properly. Staffs were very friendly and cooperative.

Then I met Dr S S Kumar, he was patiently listening all our problem to diagnose the root cause. Once I finished telling about our problems then he asked us to do X-Ray. 

After the X-Ray, he found the root cause. Most of the doctors asked us to do surgery. But Dr S S Kumar was the only one to tell us it can be cured without surgery and he diagnosed the problem.

I followed up his treatments and visited him for reviews. Gradually i could see the difference in the pain and comfort. I could say I'm cured without any surgery.

When others asked for surgery, he diagnosed the cause and cured me without surgery which is a huge relief for patients.

Thank you Dr S S Kumar and team for the wonderful experience by giving proper treatment and service.

I highly recommend everyone to consult him for all your Ortho problems.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I was intially provided a great feedback about Astra and that they have a  machine to diagnose the intensity of the issue etc etc. I went  with high expectation, meeting Mr.Kumar was  fast  and he checked my shoulder manually and asked me to take an X Ray saying he was unable to diagnose what the actual issue was.Xray was quick after which he said there may be small distruption and gave me pain killers. I was told to undergo physiotherapy for 3 days. I am not sure if this is how it's done before reviewing the actual issue or taking an scan.I went to the counter and was attended  by a lady wearing  saree ( possibly service executive) .I was taking clarification if I had to take the physiotherapy start to end at Astra, she mentioned no we are not forcing and I can take it anywhere.I was trying to take clarification that I had already something for next two days hence following days cannot do it at Astra.She started talking like DR.,DR.has told  right and I need to do it,instead of understanding what I was explaining. The way she told I decided let me quit from here.I gave my card as bill was 300+600+300= 1200/- she said she prefers cash,Digital world and this lady was asking cash. I said swipe my card she said check if I had cash or else she would swipe my card,I had to repeat that I don't have cash.She then swiped my card and I exited. My experience not so good and would not recommend this centre.

IT was really a wonderful experience with Dr.S.S. Kumar, ** ** *** **** ******* ** ********** the problem furthermore he was patient in listening to the problems of me coming to his hospital for physio exercise. so, at the end of the day after consulting to him and taking the medicines prescribed him, my neck pain responded properly in  minimising and I had a good sleep. Today, still I am feeling better. Hope I would not end up with similar problems again. But I would much appreciate the good work of ASTRA Clinic in serving the humanity at minimal cost. I would strongly and sincerely wish to recommend to my nears and dears if they need any consultation with back pain / neck pain, spinal problems, etc ...
once again thanks to PRACT Team for their good support and services they are rendering online and after consultation follow ups and feedback works which Practo is conducting amongst patients are really superb and a special mention needs to be highlighted at this juncture.

Dr. Kumar is extremely calm, patient and someone who lends an ear to what the patient has to say. He lets you understand what and how of the symptoms/issues that one has in the most simplest of language, recommends only what is necessary (no unwanted tests, etc). It's been two days that I started my treatment for cervical pain which was there for almost around a month or so and touchwood, his prescribed meds have relieved my neck pain to a great extent. Without a doubt, my highest recommendation goes out for Dr. Kumar, thank you Sir.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,
review:
Dr. S. S. Kumar was very professional.My wife had back problems near spinal cord for past few days. He advised X ray which was taken immediately and results showed no fracture. He prescribed few medicines and said it would be okay as it is just muscle pain. 
All staff were very cooperative and polite.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I had fallen from the staircase and got my tailbone fractured. I had so much afraid that i may go for a surgery or clear passage recovery. But doctor explained me all the health issues and cleared my stressed mind.
I will update here once i get a heal. I am still in rest and medication.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I had a bad injury in my neck join bec of wrong dive in swimming, I met this doc based on the rating and he was very Crystal clear about our problem. He is very Frank and patient friendly. He suggested to take mri and consulted good physio and now I feel good.

********* ****** * He was very keen and kind on understanding the patient's problem . he never runs into conclusion of take high cost scans or report . he treating the patients in  friendly manner and never did frightened mood . he suggested patients in cool manner and pre-informed about the prescriptions side effects on tablets if any to avoid unnecessary panic .I would suggest him to any one .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: My mother had a knee pain and shoulder pain. We visited SS Kumar sir. He has explained everything to us in a very clear manner. He treated very well and now my mother is completely fine. He was so kind and friendly. All the staffs were so helpful and kind.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Dear practo, pls correct the consultation fee from Rs. 400 to Rs. 3200. pls find the break up below,new patients compulsory xray to be done(even if you have the MRI report and film with you), Rs. 700.blood test to see any vitamin deficiency, Rs. 2100.Finally, Dr. Kumar consultation fee, Rs. 400** * *** **** ********** ** ******* ***** * ***** **** ******* *** ***** *********

Booked an appointment on 28th June 2019 for the same day at 7:50 PM through the Astra Hospital website. Received a confirmation upon submission. I'm suffering from severe pain in my heel and I wanted to see Dr. S. S. Kumar for that. When I went to the hospital at 7:30 PM, I was told that the hospital did not receive any appointment request from me. I asked them if anything could be done but they did not even care about booking another appointment for me or an alternate solution.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr. S.S.Kumar was very friendly and positive.  He was quickly able to diagnose my problem and ordered only the most needed tests(X-Ray) and told me that there won’t be a need for MRI scans unless the problem doesn’t go away in a few days. He also directed me for physiotherapy which helped heal within 3 days. He asked me to follow it up with yoga kind of exercises to avoid reoccurrence of the problem.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Dr Kumar is so friendly and approachable. Clearly explains the problem and gives solution for the same. Met him for consultation for my mom and myself. On both the visits, Dr was patient to hear the issues and clearly guided for recovery. I wish him success in the new center @ Semmanchery as well.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr. SS Kumar listened to the facts of the case in a calm and composed manner. After asking pertinent questions, he asked to take tests to rule out a  few diagnoses. **** *** ***** ********* *** ***** he suggested the course of action. After 3 months, met the doctor and reported the improvement with my neck and lower back pain.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Doctor is very friendly .I went for continous back pain for which the doctor explained clearly about the problem and gave hope to me that the pain will vanish within a week.He prescribed minimal tablets as well.Physiotherapy treatment nd few exercises was prescribed.I will recommend Doctor S.S Kumar to the patients suffering from ortho issues.

I have undergone spine fusion three years back. All of a sudden there was excruciating pain and stiffness in the lower back and I  could not move. Within 10 days, there was immense relief due to Dr.S.S.kumar' s diagnosis of my problem, his immediate medication and advice..i found the doctor to be very open to discussion and friendly by nature.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review: I have approached Astra Ortho & Spine Centre, Velachery and met Dr S.S.Kumar for my Bone pain near my chest. He has given detailed and clear explanation regarding the cause of pain , and has provided a **** **** treatment.  According to my view, I suggest and recommend him as the best Ortho doctor 100%..The Hospital staff showed very good response in attending patients and the waiting time is also very less.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I came to Chennai to  visit my son and he suggested me to consult Dr S S Kumar.  My experience was good as he listened all my medical history as i am diabetic as well as suffering from asthma. He took good amount of time to explain me my arthritis condition and recommended for physiotherapy along with medication.
I am still undergoing treatment, so i can't comment on results. 
His fees and medical cost in Astra is reasonable.
Friendly and detailed diagnosis with assurances of getting better with correct physiotherapy and exercises.

I recently had an excellent experience at kumar doctor. The staff was very attentive compassionate and professional and they went above and beyond to ensure that i received the best treatment. The infrastructure was neat and clean and all the necessary equipment and facilities to provide top notch. I had neck pain  almost 1 year I consul near by clinic not yet cure recently . After I consult kumar sir he explained about the issue detailed.. And gave some physiotherapy for three days. And 1 week pain killer and some excercise.. Now I feel better.. Thanks for the treatment and your support doctor.
Doctor gave patient hearing to the issues & made appropriate suggestions. Will definitely recommend

I was having pain in my thighs since last week and I took a treatment when I was in my hometown and this re occurred and I was very scared if something is seriously wrong with my thigh or knee. The doctor gave me so much confidence and checked the knee and let thoroughly. Very polite person and gives you assurance that you will get well. Very good experience

I visited the doctor for my dad. Dad had a problem on his hand called frozen joint. He suggested simple medication and exercises which my dad did religiously. 4years of his pain vanished in a matter of 3 months. Definitely recommend this clinic and doctor

Mr Kumar is a very calm doctor listens to all your problems *** ***** ** **** * ********* ********** ** ** ******** **** *** ********* *** ***** ****** ****** I came to him with pain in the lower back, sciatica, cervical and acute pain near the knees,  bi lateral pain across the legs. ** *********** ********* *** ******* *** **** ** ****** **** ******** **** *** ******** ********** **

So far I would really recommend him for osteo related issues

He is great in dealing on my pain management. He is extremely knowledgeable and dedicated. His staff is courteous and I like the way he treat with cost affordable. He won't suggest more medicine and investigation and give right solution on my treatment. Thanks to team. The atmosphere in ASTRA is good and I feel not as hospital, it's like my home.☺

Doctor is so friendly and explaining the problems in detail. He diagnosed the problem correctly and have surgical solution. Surgery was at minimal cost and get supervision by doctor and nurses here. Thanks to the team for taking care and giving the best treatment. I would recommend all for you and this hospital for all ortho and spine problems.

Doctor was friendly and advised on a keen manner for my back pain. Proper solution was given and diagnosis with less investigation. My problem was solved and billed with affordable cost which is so much lesser than any other hospital in chennai. I would seriously refer my friends only to this hospital. Thanks for your team who served with a smile during my admission. ☺

For emergency purpose came and consulted Dr. S.S.Kumar ,it was excellent..Highly skilled and follows ethics of a doctor.
I am sure tremendous passion for his profession,certainly not in money minded.
I am happy that ,I could finally identify a very knowledged spine Dr. For my emergency .we wish very all the best for ASTRA HOSPITAL  &TEAM

Very nice hospital with good infrastructure. This is my first visit to this  hospital and first time found that receptionist staffs are too good with a smile. 
I am so much thankful to Dr S S Kumar & Dr Bhanu prakash for their care for my leg. I am now walking only due this doctor. I got my legs back. Thanks to the team. Surely lot of patients should come and get their problem cured ☺☺
First Impression is the lasting experience. Ambiance good.  Doctor conversation with patient and explanation wad good.
Good . Excellent care given by staff and was good in consulting . Best consultation and care .thank you
I have been visited this hospital 3 times. All the time I noticed that doctor is writing unnecessary tests. He is good doctor but we have to spend lot of money. I really unhappy.
The doctor gave me suggestions and possible reasons for my problem. He suggested a scan. Was very positive in his words. He made me very comfortable and listened to all my descriptions.
Good doctor **** **** ********* ** *** ******** He doesn't recommend unnecessary tests and procedures.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,
review: He is absolutely fine and calm.I like the way he explained my problem and treatment procedure.Good to revisit again.

Very good doctor. Listens carefully and diagnoses well. Doesn't recommend unnecessary tests. Very ethical and professional.

review: He is polite to understand situations. Motivating. I am satisfied with his treatment. He prescribed some medicines.

Doctor was interacting very friendly and handled the queries well. Asked many reasons to find out the root cause of the pain occurred. 

But the billing structure may get umproved with better handling.
In my first visit itself doctor started to recommend surgery for my problem even without analysing much.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,
review: The way Mr.kumar rectified the problem ( painting area) is very professional.. he also gv nice advise & instructions regarding my problem.. ********* *** ** *** **** ***** ********** ** *********
The doctor was friendly and I'm satisfied with the treatment. The hospital staffs were also friendly.
Feel very comfort. Not recommended expensive treatment Initially. will update more comments after furher treatments.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,
review:
explanation about the issue, given solution for that.
Most importantly he is using him professional knowledge for helping people. He is only not using him knowledge for earning money.
Doctor was friendly, explained the complexity of the problem I visited him for and suggested the further coarse of action aptly. Moreover he explained in terms easy to understand for a layman.
Very kind and detailed explanation on the issue and treatment.doctor's recommendations are so apt and convincing .would recommend to all those with ortho issues
It is a review  visit. He diagnosed ******** and explained the issue and suggested treatment and now my wife is far better.

Very patient friendly. Clearly explained and solved the
 Problem. Our sincere thanks to Dr Kumar. Very courteous with patients.
good, doc took time to explain details. i would recommend this doc for other users as well. this was refferred to by my friend and i am glad he did that.

Excellent. Dr. Kumar has explained the problem in detail. 
Very patient friendly ..This is what we ex pected.
Perfect doctor.. Has answers to all your questions. Patiently explains the diagnosis. Prescribes natural ways to cure than medication and surgery
Immediate diagnosis of the issue . Very friendly and clear explanation of the issue ..... Highly recommended
Very warm and humble doctor with cost effective, recommend the pre,during and post treatment taken cares
Doctor did not even check the severity of pain by putting pressure or other trechniques. Was straight away taken for X Ray and then to physiotherapist..
reply_text:
Dear Patient,

Please note that, Doctor doesn't always fully examine the patient when they are suffering from pain as it will aggregate the pain during the examination, which is why pain killers are precised first. 

As the pain subsides, The final diagnosis is usually made after examination during the second free visit. As it is required in some patients who are in pain during the first visit.

If you have any queries, kindly contact the hospital number.

review: Doctor is well experienced and he explained the issues very clearly. Even the staff are also very cooperative.

review: I went for cervical side muscle strain. He patiencely listened and consulting back with polite response. Seems to be resonable fare too.
DOCTOR EXPLAINED THE PROBLEM OF SPONDILATIS AND ADVISED FOR PHYSIO THERAPY TREATMENT. THE DRUGS PRESCRIBED GIVES IMMEDIATE RELIEF. THANK YOU DOCTOR.
*** ************* **** ***** ** *** ********* ** ****  No value formoney. At time of enquires they say less price and after they charge you more.

**** ********* didn’t have patience to listen to hear the case history and pushed me to take X ray. After seeing the X ray, he said bone degeneration. Totally he spend less than 3  minutes together & came to a conclusion. ** ****** ******** *********** *****
reply_text:
Dear Patient,
In an outpatient clinic, Doctors don't always have time to know entire history as an in patient. If you felt you had relevant ok history, you should have 
informed at that time.
Please note that, Doctor doesn't always fully examine the patient when they are suffering from pain as it will aggregate the pain during the examination, which is why pain killers are prescripted first. 

As the pain subsides, The final diagnosis is usually made after examination during the second free visit. As it is required in some patients who are in pain during the first visit.

Please note that you haven't visited for the review nor informed us your concern on the same. 

It is disheartening to see such comments against a doctor without undergoing his treatment.

If you have any queries, kindly contact the hospital number.
